Not a casedemic now -- deaths have soared. Can all be understood easily enough within framework of R0 seasonality & herd immunity. Schematically, if summer R0=2 & fall R0=4, epidemic tapers at HI=0.5 in summer, HI = .75 in fall => fall flush adds 50% mortality. Then goes endemic.
